post.text: Muhammad Ali is dead at 74! A truly great champion and a wonderful guy. He will be missed by all!

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: Many wonderful memories He will be missed! The Muhammed Ali clinic takes care of over 10,000 with Parkinson what a blessing, he touched so many lives! A Great Champion inside and outside the ring!

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: Not bad for a Muslim eh?
